mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (auth_key, email, pwd, birth, nick_name, profile_img, role, is_deleted, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{authKey}, #{email}, #{pwd}, #{birth}, #{nickName}, #{profileImg}, #{role}, #{isDeleted}, now(), now());
mapper.select: SELECT exists(SELECT 1 FROM users WHERE auth_key=#{authKey});
